table_foot: Mean AUC values from 50 repetitions. Multimodal models result from step-wise addition of measures to the best performing classification model of the previous step, starting with the best performing single MRI measure (i.e. RD). Bold: best performing model. Italic: mean AUC significantly higher than chance level after family-wise error rate correction.Abbreviations: AxD: axial diffusivity; FA: fractional anisotropy; FCor: full correlations between ICA components; GMD: grey matter density; MD: mean diffusivity; PCor: L1-regularised partial correlations between ICA components; RD: radial diffusivity; WMD: white matter density; AUC: area under the ROC curve.
